description: TechNova Inc. is a global leader in AI-driven solutions, cloud computing, and enterprise automation. The company provides cutting-edge technologies to enhance business productivity, streamline operations, and improve decision-making using AI and data analytics.

products.name: NovaAI
products.description: NovaAI is an advanced AI platform that delivers capabilities across natural language processing (NLP), computer vision, and predictive analytics. It helps businesses automate workflows, generate insights, and optimize decision-making using machine learning models.
features: Natural Language Processing (NLP) for chatbots and virtual assistants
Computer Vision for image and video analysis
Custom AI Model Training and Deployment

pricing.basic: $49/month - Includes basic NLP and vision capabilities
pricing.pro: $99/month - Adds predictive analytics and advanced AI training
pricing.enterprise: Custom pricing - Includes API access, advanced AI tuning, and enterprise support

products.name: CloudNova
products.description: CloudNova is a highly scalable cloud computing platform offering storage, computing power, and security solutions tailored for enterprise applications. It supports multi-cloud and hybrid cloud deployments.
features: Scalable Cloud Storage with High Availability
API Access for Custom Cloud Solutions

use_cases.example: IoT-enabled predictive maintenance for factory machines.

pricing.pay-as-you-go: Starts at $0.02/GB per month for storage
pricing.enterprise: Custom pricing based on resource usage

services.name: AI Consulting
services.description: TechNova’s AI consulting service helps businesses design, develop, and deploy AI-powered applications, ensuring optimized performance and scalability.
services.pricing: Custom pricing based on project requirements

services.name: Cloud Migration
services.description: TechNova assists businesses in seamlessly migrating their workloads to CloudNova with minimal downtime and optimized resource allocation.
services.pricing: Custom pricing based on data size and complexity

services.name: Enterprise Support
services.description: 24/7 technical support and personalized assistance for businesses using TechNova's AI and cloud solutions.

customer_success_stories.challenge: Detecting fraudulent transactions in real time.
customer_success_stories.solution: Implemented NovaAI’s predictive analytics to flag high-risk transactions before processing.
customer_success_stories.results: Reduced fraud losses by 40% within the first year.

customer_success_stories.solution: Used NovaAI’s computer vision technology to analyze X-ray and MRI scans.
customer_success_stories.results: Increased diagnostic accuracy by 25% compared to manual review.

faq.question: How can I upgrade my NovaAI plan?
faq.answer: You can upgrade your plan through the dashboard by selecting a new subscription tier, or contact support for assistance.

faq.question: Does CloudNova provide automatic backups?
faq.answer: Yes, CloudNova offers automated daily backups with retention policies based on your selected plan.

faq.question: What is the SLA for enterprise customers?
faq.answer: Enterprise customers receive a 99.9% uptime guarantee with 24/7 priority support.

faq.question: Can I integrate NovaAI with my existing CRM?
faq.answer: Yes, NovaAI provides API integrations for seamless connection with popular CRM platforms.

policies.refund_policy: Customers can request a refund within 30 days of purchase for eligible products and services.
policies.data_privacy: TechNova Inc. complies with GDPR and ensures user data protection with industry-standard encryption.
policies.terms_of_service: Use of TechNova Inc. services is subject to the terms and conditions outlined on our website.

security_compliance.data_encryption: AES-256 encryption for data at rest and in transit.
